Package org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Bridge
    A Core Bridge
    BroadcastGroup
    A BroadcastGroup
    ClusterConnection
    A ClusterConnection
    MessageFlowRecord
    A MessageFlowRecord
    RemoteQueueBinding
    A RemoteQueueBinding

    A Transformer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveMQServerSideProtocolManagerFactory
    A protocol manager that will replace the packet manager for inter-server communications
    BackupManager  
    ClusterConfigurationUtil  
    ClusterControl
    handles the communication between a cluster node and the cluster, either the whole cluster or a specific node in the cluster such as a replicating node.
    ClusterController
    used for creating and managing cluster control connections for each cluster connection and the replication connection
    ClusterManager
    A ClusterManager manages ClusterConnections, BroadcastGroups and Bridges.
    ClusterManager.IncomingInterceptorLookingForExceptionMessage
